description.mainDescription: Inspired by the original that debuted in 1985, the air Jordan 1 Low offers a clean, classic look that's familiar yet always fresh. It's made for casual mode, with an iconic design that goes with everything and never goes out of style.

productDetails: An encapsulated Air-Sole unit provides lightweight cushioning.
Genuine leather in the upper offers durability and premium look.
A solid-rubber outsole enhances traction on a variety of surfaces.

description.mainDescription: The Air Jordan 1 Phantom Shoe is inspired by the first AJ1, offering OG fans a look at how far the jordan brand has come since 1985.

productDetails: An Air-Sole unit provides lighweight cushioning.
A leather and synthetic upper offers durability and premium look.
A solid-rubber outsole enhances traction on a variety of surfaces.

description.mainDescription: The Air Jordan 1 Mid Shoe is inspired by the first AJ1, offering OG fans a look at how far the jordan brand has come since 1985.

description.subDescriptionOne: A combination of real and synthetic leather provides structure and durability while recreating the shoe's classic profile.

description.subDescriptionTwo: The rubber cupsole with herringbone traction pattern provides log-lasting grip on a variety of surfaces.

description.mainTitle: THE ICONIC AJ1, MODERNIZED FOR LIGHWEIGHT COMFORT.
description.mainDescription: The Air Jordan 1 High React combines the lasting appeal of the original AJ1 with soft and springy foam cushioning. Genuine leather and textile materials give a new, modern identity to an enduring icon.

description.subDescriptionOne: Nike React technology is soft, springy and stable, providing a smooth, cushiony ride.

description.subDescriptionTwo: Genuine leather on the toe and heel provides durability and support. Textile panels add lightweight texture to the mix.

description.subDescriptionThree: 1/2-bootie construction and a plush foam collar offer a snug, comfortable fit.

productDetails: The rubber outsole with an exaggerated herringbone pattern provides traction.

description.mainDescription: The Air Jordan 1 was designed for a player who ignited the court and changed the league forever. The Air Jordan 1 Retro High Women's Shoe recals the iconic design elements of the original, including the legendary Wings logo.

productDetails: Nike Air cushioning for lighweight comfort
